name: Gesture.js
tagline: make the elements can scaling,rotatiton and translation
body: # gesture.js make the elements can scaling,rotatiton and translation 在移动设备上，让元素可以缩放、旋转和平移 ### Demo Click Here ### 使用方法 项目中引入gesture.js ``` ``` 实例化： ``` var $e = $("#e"); var dragable = new Dragable($e); ``` 提供的接口: dragable.getStatus() //获取元素的状态
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
